name: Happy Cat - Sky Fly By Balloon
name_original: Happy Cat - Sky Fly By Balloon
description:
Play the most fun and challenging adventure game.
Help cat fly to highest sky by balloon.

Swipe your finger to clear up the obstacles. Block the balloon from damage.

Features:
- Simple swipe controls.
- Various roles and visual effects.
- Many kinds of obstacles for fun.
- Endless levels and gameplay.
